Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners

Class RamProvisionerSimple

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners.RamProvisioner
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners.RamProvisionerSimple
  • public class RamProvisionerSimple
extends RamProvisioner
    RamProvisionerSimple is an extension of RamProvisioner which uses a best-effort policy to allocate memory to a VM.
    Since:
    CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
    Author:
    Rodrigo N. Calheiros, Anton Beloglazov
